Homepage.title: Welcome to Tamperella web site!
Homepage.description: Tampere is the best city in Finland. It is known for its beautiful nature and many activities. This website is a project of mine where I show my favourite places and activities in Tampere. I am 100% biased, but I hope you enjoy it anyway!
